item.title: The Russo Brothers Address "Intense" Pressure Of Ending The MCU's Multiverse Saga With Avengers: Doomsday & Avengers: Secret Wars
item.description: Joe and Anthony Russo recently opened up about their choice to return to the Marvel Cinematic Universe to bring the Avengers together once again.

item.title: Tom Selleck's 10 Best Movies And TV Shows
item.description: Tom Selleck has brought some iconic characters to TV in Blue Bloods and Magnum PI and his best movies and TV shows include even more great characters.

item.title: Why The Rings Of Power Don't Turn The Elves Into Ringwraiths In The Lord Of The Rings
item.description: The Rings of Power in The Lord of the Rings do not turn the Elves or the Dwarves into Ringwraiths like Men. However, there is a reason for that.
